## submit() function

对提交类行为的封装。

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function submit<TResult>(action: (payload: SubmitActionPayload) => Promise<TResult>): Promise<TResult>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  action | (payload: [SubmitActionPayload](./taro.submitactionpayload.md)<!-- -->) =&gt; Promise&lt;TResult&gt; | 行为 |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;TResult&gt;

返回行为结果

## Example


```typescript
await submit(async _ => {
  await _.start('保存中...')
  await save(data)
  await _.success('保存成功')
})

```
